actions.text: Referred to House Committee on  Judiciary.

official_title: Resolution requesting the President to appoint a special prosecutor with respect to offenses related to the Presidential campaign of 1972 from among three individuals to be named by the President of the American Bar Association.

summary.text: Requests the President to appoint a special prosecutor with respect to offenses related to the Presidential campaign of 1972 from among three individuals to be named by the President of the American Bar Association.

titles.title: Resolution requesting the President to appoint a special prosecutor with respect to offenses related to the Presidential campaign of 1972 from among three individuals to be named by the President of the American Bar Association.
